subject: another lengthy post about ebay in answer to Rhonda
author: bruce halliday
full_text:
--_8d118729-d4bd-401a-94f1-431cecc56ef5_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


Rhonda,
 
Everyone is misunderstanding my point.
my whole post was about s=
topping any furtherance of the negative
vibrations this issue was already c=
ausing and that would have been empowered by 
an attempt to sabotage this i=
diot on ebay.
 
I am the first to advocate putting out information on hacki=
ng your own box and educating people about our research
and to be aware of =
the snake oil salesman that are lurking in the shadows.
 
Most of the unedu=
cated people that are seeing a box or information about one, right now are =
doing so mainly because
of the publicity the box received on the tv show pa=
ranormal state. So I believe that when a new individual is begging a 
searc=
h for knowledge about what is being done with this method, they are not goi=
ng to go to ebay first for their initial source 
of information they may vi=
sit ebay after they derive their initial information and decide to get invo=
lved with our work.
But I think their first venue for knowledge would be a =
google search, I know that's what mine was.
 
All I was trying to say was t=
hat there are much more suitable places for these individuals to have acces=
s to the information you want to put on ebay, and lets face it, the initial=
 reaction to this whole thing was not the concern of the people getting the=
 boxes, 
it was to stop the asshole that was selling the boxes. Which actua=
lly "If you cut off the head of the snake" still in all the immediate 
emot=
ion was one of anger and subversion of this individual. That in itself brin=
gs negative vibration to the field, it's the ripple in the pond affect.
 
A=
lso I believe that people that have decide to start their hunt for a box an=
d wind up at ebay, already have the mindset to buy the box if they see it.
=
And if they see the actual box for sale and then see an advertisement that =
is just that and not the actual box, chances are they will concentrate on t=
he actual box
and ignore the advert.
 
If we feel as a group that something=
 needs to be done, we should try and reach these people before they get to =
ebay at all! If we can come up with an education campaign that
utilizes all=
 obvious venues of paranormal information which is the first spot anyone wi=
ll look, then count me in 100%
 
But as far as launching a campaign against=
 this one sad individual under the guise of helping people not get swindled=
, I know for myself and I am being completely truthful with you and myself
=
my first motivation would be to stick it to this guy and if I helped some p=
eople avoid a bad deal in doing that all the better. So that's what I meant=
 by negativity attached to the box.
 
Lets get the word out to the paranorm=
al community and they will steer the inquiries our way. That's when we real=
ly can help.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: rho=
ndak1973@...: Tue, 8 Apr 2008 10:07:58 -0700Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC=
] Re: another lengthy post about ebay in answer to margaret





Bruce,
 
B=
ut didnt you say that those boxes that ebay guy was over charging for would=
 come with negative energy attached to them?  If that was the case, wouldnt=
 we want to prevent them from being spread around?  How can we do that if w=
e "turn the other cheek"?  Not tryin to stir the pot, Im just curious...I t=
hink the post giving free info on hacking your own RS boxes would be better=
 than an attack of emails and comments on the guys page and would also be b=
etter than doing nothing....
 
BUT on the otherhand...wouldnt this give tho=
se money hungry people out there a way to overcharge and take from innocent=
 people...those kind of people would then turn around and post their hacked=
 boxes on ebay and then we would see an outbreak of over charging and innoc=
ent people being taken advantage of...hmmm its kinda a catch 22......damned=
 if ya do and damned if ya dont!
 
Rhondabruce halliday <paranormalinvestig=
ating@...> wrote:


Margaret, In my initial reply I voiced my disda=
in for low lives that take advantage of unwary peoplebut did not advocate a=
ny action by any researchers on this board. My goal is not just pacifism fo=
r it's own sake, believe me any of the old timers here can attest to my tem=
per.My concern is for the negative disruption in the energy flow of the com=
munication.I think that following the example of "turn the other cheek" wil=
l be very well received on the other side and therefore contribute to stren=
gthening the bridge. In the past couple of days I know Kristin has received=
 messages about the seven and the circle, these are metaphors for peace, ha=
rmony and cooperation of energies within the communication. It is not the f=
irst time we have received messages with these examples, I personally have =
received numerous messages pertaining to circle, circles and the power of s=
even. It has been contemplated in length here more than once. I have, throu=
gh interpretation of communication over a long period of time, come to PERS=
ONALLY believe that the urgence of harmony and positive energy is the ferti=
lizer of the growth of our communication with the spirit world. I'm sorry, =
I drifted off the subject at hand, but my reason is relevant to this commen=
tary. Taking any action against this ebay fool will first and foremost serv=
e our ego's and secondlymay help to provide information to unwary buyers th=
at is contrary to what this thief is putting out. But could that not be acc=
omplished through other venues that would help to educate many more people =
thatare would be box researchers and do not look to ebay as a source for an=
 RS hack. But are seeking general knowledge. And Margaret to thine own self=
 be true, when this was brought up my first reaction was to figure out a wa=
y to sabotagethis guy's business venture. After thinking it over and asking=
 myself what the first reason for doing that would be. My answerWas, to get=
 this asshole that is exploiting something that I hold very dear, and in tu=
rn help to steer unaware buyers away from getting screwed. But still my ini=
tial and primal reason was to inflict some sort of punishment on a person t=
hat I felt was unscrupulous. And I decided that this wasa negative emotion =
and would generate negative energy, no matter how I tried to convince mysel=
f it was in the name of justice. That goes without even mentioning the fact=
 that we are not the say all and do all of this research. There are other e=
ntities involved that I would think have better influential power than we d=
o. If they want it stopped they will find a way to stop it. I know what you=
r going to say, maybe we are the tools they are using to stop this injustic=
e. That may very well be, and if so then that is the way it will play out. =
I think you mistake what I am implying. I am not saying do nothing, quite t=
he opposite. It is actually our duty to do something. All I'm saying is the=
re are alternative ways to educate unwary possible researchers that would b=
e 100% positive and not entail any type of stone throwing tactics. I have s=
aid my piece now at the expense of boring everyone to death. So I will see =
how this unfolds, and during my daily session will inquire about how our fr=
iends feel about it. Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFro=
m: ITCdeadpeople@...: Tue, 8 Apr 2008 01:20:11 +0000Subject: [EVP-I=
TC] Re: My opinion on what should be done about ebay_I know it's long but p=
lease rea


Hi Bruce. I don't see this so much as an assault on anyone, as =
it is simply bringing awareness into a forum (ebay) where it is desperately=
 needed. Was it not you who recently stated sellers who take advantage of o=
thers in this way are "no more than thieves without guns" and "should not b=
e patronized no matter the circumstances." You have characterized them as "=
wolves" and "demons" but now are saying "do nothing." Which, honestly, I co=
uld understand if my suggestion was coming from a place of vengeance. It is=
 not.THIS IS ABOUT EDUCATION FIRST AND FOREMOST, and standing up for those =
who are, unknowingly, being taken advantage of. The byproduct of providing =
this education will be allowing consumers to make an informed decision and =
if that hurts the sales of unscrupulous sellers, then so be it. Ann has jus=
t echoed some of my remarks in earlier posts in support of sellers rights t=
o take advantage of the market ... that some people may find it's worth it =
to pay more to someone to receive a previously hacked unit. I would venture=
 to guess, this educational information will A) help prevent those who are =
capable of doing the hack themselves from being duped, and B) force sellers=
 who do offer pre-hacked units to do so for a more 'reasonable' fee. This i=
s neither spiteful nor aggressive, and it's certainly not any kind of venge=
ance driven on my part. It's standing up for the uninformed, leveling the p=
laying field for sellers, and it's bringing more people the knowledge that =
doing 'box' research is not an exclusive club that only the rich can take p=
art in (and given the pricing on the bids for these units, people are under=
 the false assumption that you have a pay a high price to get your hands on=
 a limited resource, when that simply is not the case.)I can see nothing bu=
t positive benefits coming from educating people about their options.Margar=
et--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" <paranormalinvestigating@...> =
wrote:>> > Hi Everyone,> > I have been reading the back and forth posts abo=
ut ideas on how to > deal with the individual selling the hacks on ebay for=

 would now like > to render my opinion as to the subject of what we or anyo=
ne can do > about it.> > My suggestion is DO NOTHING! Now before everybody'=
s jaw hits the > floor, hear me out.> > A couple of months ago I would have=
 been the one to lead the charge > in the assault on this guy in the name o=
f box justice.> > I can now say with confidence, That is not the way to han=
dle it.> Let me explain why I believe this way. Without going into a lot of=
 > detail, I was a tough street kid that grew up on the streets of > Brookl=
yn, I also served my country proudly for six years as a us army > green ber=
et, then to a career as a FDNY Fireman whose heart and > health where both =
broken at 911.> > My point is, I have always lived my life believing that a=
nything I > did not agree with or that did not fit my sense of right and wr=
ong> whether it be right or wrong, could be easily solved with aggression >=
 of some kind.> > It took a long while and much sole searching and a lot of=
 > communication interpretation from our friends on the other side.> But I =
have come to learn that aggressive action in any form is > detrimental to t=
he harmony and peace of the whole involved.> > Guy's like this guy on ebay =
do not and can not last in the face of > good and well intentioned people t=
hat are here and willing and trying > to get the word of this miraculous re=
search and spirit communication > out to as many people as are in need or w=
ant of it.> > That is how we can stop people like this bottom feeder. By sp=
reading > the knowledge of this research from one person to the next. Our >=
 friends have stated time and time again that any negative energy will > be=
 detrimental to the communication and the research, and positive > harmony =
and vibration will serve to strengthen the bridge between our > worlds.> > =
So even if you are not religious and do not believe in Jesus Christ > as I =
do, these words ring true no matter what context they come from> this wisdo=
m was spoken by my lord two thousand years ago.> > "do not check the splint=
er in your brothers eye, until you have > checked the plank in your own"> >=
 Truthfully, anything we could do to sway this individuals sale of > these =
boxes would be minimal. Negativity and greed always find a > crack to seep =
through.> > My suggestion is lets try a little harder to spread the word of=
 the > research and educate individuals that are or may become interested, =
> through all the various outlets available to us on the web concerning > t=
he paranormal research community. There are endless chat boards, > groups a=
nd forums plus websites and word of mouth. > Instead of trying to stop this=
 idiot from defrauding innocent > unknowledgable people. Lets make sure the=
 knowledge is out there for > them and we are here to help them and guy's l=
ike Mr. ebay will > disappear on their own.> > And we will not have expende=
d an ounce of negative energy in the > process.> That's how I feel, but tha=
t's just me.> > Bruce>

Rhonda,<BR>
 <BR>
Everyone is misunderstanding my point.<B=
R>
my whole post was about stopping any furtherance of the negative<BR>
vib=
rations this issue was already causing and that would have been empowered b=
y <BR>
an attempt to sabotage this idiot on ebay.<BR>
 <BR>
I am the f=
irst to advocate putting out information on hacking your own box and educat=

Most of the uneducate=

earch for knowledge about what is being done with this method, they are not=

of information the=

But I think their first venue for knowledge=

 <BR>
All =

individuals to have access to the information <BR>you want to put on ebay, =
and lets face it, the initial reaction to this whole thing was not the conc=
ern of the people getting the boxes, <BR>
it was to stop the asshole that w=
as selling the boxes. Which actually "If you cut off the head of the snake"=
 still in all the immediate <BR>

 this individual. That in itself brings negative vibration to the field, it=

 <BR>
Also I believe that people=
 that have decide to start their hunt for a box and wind up at ebay, alread=
y have the mindset to buy the box if they see it.<BR>
And if they see the a=
ctual box for sale and then see an advertisement that is just that and not =
the actual box, chances are they will concentrate on the actual box<BR>
and=

 <BR>
If we feel as a group that something nee=
ds to be done, we should try and reach these people before they get to ebay=
 at all! If we can come up with an education campaign that<BR>
utilizes all=

ll look, then count me in 100%<BR>

But as far as launching a cam=
paign against this one sad individual under the guise of helping people not=

u and myself<BR>
my first motivation would be to stick it to this guy and i=
f I helped some people avoid a bad deal in doing that all the better. So th=
at's what I meant by negativity attached to the box.<BR>
 <BR>
Lets ge=
t the word out to the paranormal community and they will steer the inquirie=
s our way. That's when we really can help.<BR>
 <BR>
